attacks.name: Smash Turn
attacks.effect: After your attack, you may switch Blastoise with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rocket Tackle
attacks.effect: Blastoise does 10 damage to itself. Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Blastoise by attacks during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Fire Spin
attacks.effect: Discard 2 basic Energy cards attached to Flareon or this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Pin Missile
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Cheer Up
attacks.effect: Draw a card. If you have Plusle in play, draw 2 cards instead.

attacks.name: Negative Ion
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Power Bolt
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon that has any Poké-Powers. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Cheer Up
attacks.effect: Draw a card. If you have Minun in play, draw 2 cards instead.

attacks.name: Positive Ion
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Body Bolt
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon that has any Poké-Bodies. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Water Gun
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Vaporeon but not used to pay for this attack’s Energy cost. You can’t add more than 40 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.effect: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Combusken.

attacks.name: Sniff Out
attacks.effect: Put any 1 card from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Fury Attack
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Toxic
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on the Defending Pokémon between turns.

cards.name: High Pressure System
cards.effect: Each player pays Colorless less to retreat his or her Fire and Water Pokémon.

cards.name: Low Pressure System
cards.effect: Each Grass and Lightning Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent’s) gets +10 HP.

abilities.name: Duplicate
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for another Ditto and switch it with Ditto. (Any cards attached to Ditto, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Ditto on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can’t use more than 1 Duplicate Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.effect: Eevee does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Gouge
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Poisonpowder
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Double-edge
attacks.effect: Marshtomp does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Bustle
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads. If either coin is heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

abilities.name: Golden Wing
abilities.effect: If Ho-Oh ex would be Knocked Out by damage from an opponent’s attack, you may move up to 2 Energy attached to Ho-Oh ex to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Rainbow Burn
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 20 more damage for each type of basic Energy card attached to Ho-Oh ex.
